resources.string: Device could not be found, make sure the device is nearby.
Connection with the device has been lost, make sure the device is nearby, is on and in discovery mode.

The Android system has not recognised the device as compatible for Bluetooth classic connections. Please remove the device from the system, make sure it advertises for classic connections and pair it again using the system.
Device does not have the required services in its service record. The device might not be compatible with this application/feature.
The connection to the device could not be established, make sure the Bluetooth is on for this Android device.
The connection to the device could not be established: the device has failed to respond in time. Make sure that the device is close enough to improve responses.
The connection to the device could not be established: pairing failed. Make sure that the device is in pairing mode and try again.
The connection to the device could not be established, make sure the device can be connected.
